overview: Kogoro and his group visit Tsukikage Island after receiving a letter from a person named Keiji Aso.  However, it is said that the client was a pianist who died 12 years ago.  When the party was waiting for the village chief at the town hall to find out about the client, the  moonlight rang and a candidate for the mayor election was found dead.  And the next day, while the police are conducting an investigation, the  “moonlight” that hints at death resounds...
title: Detective Conan: Moonlight Sonata Murder Case
